(row = 6, col = 2)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 6, col = 2)

Given that your avatar is currently located at (row = 6, col = 2) and did not move from the last position, it indicates that any directional action I attempted may have resulted only in a rotation. Since the objective is to continuously manipulate citizens and convert them while avoiding encounters with demons, I will try to change the avatar's position.

In this state, both left (col = 1) and right (col = 3) are available for movement, but I will opt to move to the right (to col = 3) since it is likely I can position myself closer to potential citizens, which may help in my goal of converting them to blessed sprites.

``` Action:2 ``` 

This action should help find a better positioning in relation to the citizens and avoid any interactions with the demon nearby.
